# Hello

## My name is Daniel Bergholz, I'm a Fullstack Developer and Content Creator from Brazil

 [Contact me](mailto:bergholz.daniel@gmail.com "Send email to Daniel Bergholz")[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DanielBergholz "YouTube")[X (Formerly Twitter)](https://twitter.com/danielbergholz "X (Formerly Twitter)")[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-gobbi-bergholz/ "LinkedIn")[GitHub](https://github.com/danielbergholz "GitHub") [Get early access to my upcoming courses](https://www.youtube.com/@DanielBergholz/join)

## Free Programming Courses
[**Phoenix crash course** \\
\\
ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸\\
\\
Learn the powerful Phoenix framework for Elixir in this crash course, covering key concepts like routing, controllers, HEEx components, Ecto, authentication, internationalization, and JSON APIs. With a mix of theory and hands-on examples, you'll gain both foundational knowledge and practical skills to build robust web applications\\
\\
FreeNew\\
\\
21 videos\\
\\
![Phoenix crash course](https://bergdaniel.com.br/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.ytimg.com%2Fvi%2FhsYrr1OgQ28%2Fmaxresdefault.jpg&w=828&q=75)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbV6TI03ZWYXKCJePfD8G34hyWdW_WLFk "Phoenix crash course") [**Elixir crash course** \\
\\
ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸\\
\\
Learn the fundamentals of Elixir in this free crash course! Whether you're new to functional programming or want to quickly get productive, this course covers essential topics like pattern matching, immutability, and recursion. Perfect for developers looking to build scalable and fault-tolerant systems\\
\\
Free\\
\\
21 videos\\
\\
